summary: Orlando is a city in Florida and the center of a large metropolitan area. It's the fourth most populous city in Florida and the most populous inland city. Orlando is famous for tourism, with over 2.9 million visitors in 2022, thanks to attractions like Walt Disney World and Universal Orlando. It has a busy airport and is a popular place for conferences. The city is also home to the University of Central Florida, one of the largest universities in the U.S.
title: Orlando, Florida
